engine.util.menu

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.util.menu.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents one level of a menu system.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Menu

        public Menu(java.lang.String[] options,
    IMenuHandler handler)
        Creates a new Menu.
        Parameters:
        options - All the options in the menu.
        handler - The handler that processes the options.

    • Method Detail

      • setMenuStack

        public void setMenuStack(MenuStack stack)
        Sets the MenuStack for this menu.
        Parameters:
        stack - The MenuStack to set.

      • activate

        public void activate()
        Activates the menu handler for the currently selected option.

      • move

        public void move(int amt)
        Moves the menu up or down by the specified amount.
        Parameters:
        amt - How much to move up or down by.

      • render

        public void render(IRenderContext target,
          SpriteSheet font,
          double offsetX,
          double offsetY,
          double scale,
          Color selectionColor,
          Color fontColor)
        Renders the menu.
        Parameters:
        target - The render context to draw the menu with.
        font - The font to render text with.
        offsetX - The location, on X, to begin rendering at.
        offsetY - The location, on Y, to begin rendering at.
        scale - How large each character of text should be.
        selectionColor - The color to use for the currently selected menu option.
        fontColor - The color to use for normal menu options.
